nodes.text: Telmath was a city on the planet Kesh around 2974 BBY. It was located on the southeastern corner of the continent of Keshtah Minor. As with other parts of the planet, it was ruled by the Lost Tribe of Sith, the descendants of Human Sith who had become stranded on Kesh during the Great Hyperspace War. As with other urban settlements, Telmath had a local constabulary that was tasked with enforcing law and order. The Sith outcast Parlan Spinner was known to have visited the settlement prior to his capture and banishment from Keshtah.
